info.description: This is the API server for the Diploma project.
info.title: Diploma Server API

post.description: Send reset password link to email
Register a new user with email, password and name

get.description: Verify user email with token
Resends the verification email to the user
Initiate OAuth2 login with a provider (google, etc.)
Handle OAuth2 callback

post.description: Create a new home with a name
Join a home with an invite code

get.description: Get the home the user belongs to
Get all notifications for the current user
Get home details by ID

post.description: Create a new bill in a home

get.description: Get bill details by ID

delete.description: Remove a member from the home

get.description: Get all notifications for a home

delete.description: Mark a home notification as read

get.description: Get all polls in a home
get.summary: Get all polls by home ID

post.description: Create a new poll in a home

get.description: Get poll details by ID

post.description: Regenerate invite code for a home

get.description: Get all rooms in a home

post.description: Create a new room in a home

get.description: Get room details by ID

post.description: Create a new shopping category in a home

get.description: Get all shopping categories in a home
Get shopping category details by ID

put.description: Edit a shopping category by ID

delete.description: Delete a shopping category by ID

get.description: Get all shopping items in a category
get.summary: Get shopping items by category ID

post.description: Create a new shopping item in a category

get.description: Get shopping item details by ID

put.description: Edit a shopping item by ID

delete.description: Delete a shopping item by ID

patch.description: Mark a shopping item as bought

get.description: Get all tasks in a home

post.description: Create a new task in a home

get.description: Get task details by ID

post.description: Assign a user to a task

patch.description: Reassign a room for a task

get.description: Get all assignments for a user in a home
Get the closest assignment for a user in a home

post.description: Get details of the currently logged in user
